channel.title: ASF JIRA
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [SPARK-17884] In the cast expression, casting from empty string to interval type throws NullPointerException
item.description:
When the cast expression is applied on empty string "" to cast it to interval type it throws Null pointer exception..

Getting the same exception when I tried reproducing the same through test case
checkEvaluation(Cast(Literal(""), CalendarIntervalType), null)

Exception i am getting is:
java.lang.NullPointerException was thrown.
java.lang.NullPointerException
